worthless info as usual from YIFY.  You should include video and audio bitrates at least.  

http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net/en/Download

Here you can download mediainfo.  After it completes, you can right click on any audio or video information and it will tell you the bitrates, codecs, etc.  Very handy for uploaders like YIFY who choose not to share it with the downloaders.

@ alumman 

This is widescreen, so the video is 1280x720 if you include the black bars on top of and underneath the video.  However, the actual video itself is 1280x536.
